title: Icarus
description:
Encapsulating the passion and undeniable talent of Romanian artist Flori Bulduș, ‘Icarus’ is one of the masterpieces of the ‘Sap of Life’ series.

The painting is a vibrant expression of the timeless legend of Icarus, masterfully captured by the gifted painter Flori Bulduș. Inspired by the myth of Icarus—who, driven by the desire for ascension and freedom, flew too close to the sun, melting the wax on his wings—this piece blends warm colors with rich textures.

With every glance, ‘Icarus’ reveals new details. The rich color palette ranges from golden tones to deep shades of copper, reflecting the heat of the sun and the melting wax. A subtle yet essential detail is the wing falling toward the earth, provoking the viewer to delve deeper.

This piece is ideal for art collectors and mythology enthusiasts alike. By owning ‘Icarus’ you bring a touch of classical mythology and Romanian art into your space.

Each work in the ‘Sap of Life’ series tells a unique story, and ‘Icarus’ is no exception. Take advantage of the opportunity to own this piece.
